name: Beer & Bolter
description: A web app that empowers Warhammer 40,000 enthusiasts to design and share their own custom Space Marine chapters. Users can craft detailed lore, build a personalized color scheme, and showcase their faction to the community. The platform encourages creativity and offers an immersive way to connect with other fans through shared narratives.

name: Kira
description: A 2D platformer game about a young girl lost in the forest. It features multiple enemy types and diverse biomes, each with unique challenges and aesthetics. The game emphasizes atmospheric exploration and personal growth as players unravel the story.

name: GymBud
description: An AI-driven wellbeing mobile app that helps users in a playful, friendly way with exercise suggestions, nutrition tips, and chat-based guidance. It offers personalized insights and encourages consistency with gamified progress tracking and adaptive coaching.

name: Biblio API
description: An API designed to manage books in a smart library system without the need for on-site personnel. It handles book lending, returns, and inventory tracking, offering a scalable backend solution for autonomous libraries or school systems.

name: CityLife
description: A mobile app that helps people engage with their region or city. It offers insights into available public services, sends reminders for events like recycling pickup, and features an interactive digital billboard for local announcements. It's designed to boost civic engagement and improve urban living.

name: SmartPiano
description: An innovative piano using Arduino technology where AI plays a central role in pattern recognition and note generation. This project aims to revolutionize musical interaction by translating visual cues into musical notes, allowing users to compose or learn music through an entirely new and interactive interface.

name: Blueprints.js
description: An experimental UI framework aiming to build interactive frontends without relying on traditional HTML tags. The project explores alternative syntax structures and component-based logic, pushing the boundaries of how we conceptualize and develop user interfaces.

name: Web Portfolio
description: A personal portfolio rebuilt with React, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, and Shadcn/ui components. It showcases a modern UI/UX approach, responsive design, and a dynamic layout to effectively present projects and skills in a professional manner.
